definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
compassion, duty, propriety and integrity (idiom); all the traditional virtues/mainly used sarcastically, to mean hypocritical
the Book of Dao by Laozi or Lao-Tze, the sacred text of Daoism

sentences.english: The antagonism of moralities is an important factor to influence world harmony.
sentences.chinese: 道德的对立是影响世界和谐的重要因素。

sentences.english: This chapter of Tao Te Ching is usually being called Great Conformity.
sentences.chinese: 这篇道德经一般人称之谓大顺。

sentences.english: Knowledge without conscience is the ruination of the soul.
sentences.chinese: 没有道德依托的知识，是对人性的毁灭。

sentences.english: Moral criteria are nature, the Tao, artificiality and manner.
sentences.chinese: 自然，道，人为，礼仪等道德标准。

sentences.english: Youth and juveniles are the main part of immoralities on web.
sentences.chinese: 青少年是互联网上不道德行为的重要主体。

sentences.english: In short, they might make better ethical decisions than people.
sentences.chinese: 简言之，它们会比人类做出更恰当的道德判断。

sentences.english: Moral and em o tional education is rather essential in teenagers' moral development.
sentences.chinese: 道德情感教育对青少年道德成长具有重要作用。

sentences.english: Moral and em o tional education is rather essential in teenagers' moral development.
sentences.chinese: 道德情感教育对青少年道德成长具有重要作用。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 战俘依然受军法约束，以及军人守则的道德指导。

sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的职业道德是与党和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: Does the Human Genome Project affect the moral standards of society?
sentences.chinese: 人类基因组计划是否影响社会的道德标准呢？

sentences.english: Keeping the law is a legal obligation and moral requirement which manifests as the law-abiding action.
sentences.chinese: 守法是一种法定的义务和道德要求。

sentences.english: But at this I can say ethical, cultural, as well.
sentences.chinese: 当然道德的和文化的理解也一样如此。

sentences.english: She has the kind of attitude and work ethic that employers crave.
sentences.chinese: 她有雇主们渴望的工作态度和职业道德。

sentences.english: Moral judgement has no place in the world of remediating disability.
sentences.chinese: 在医治缺陷的世界里道德判断没市场。

definition: innate sense of right and wrong/conscience/bosom friend
human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)
